time_structure.title: Time Structure
time_structure.description: Select your time structure for fixed pricing

octopus_credentials.title: Octopus Energy Credentials
octopus_credentials.description:
Enter your Octopus Energy España account credentials.

Your account number will be automatically detected after authentication. If you have multiple accounts, you'll be able to select which one to use.

select_property.title: Select Account
select_property.description: Multiple accounts found. Please select the account you want to monitor.

manual_account.title: Enter Account Number
manual_account.description:
Account auto-detection failed. Please enter your Octopus Energy account number manually.

You can find your account number by:
• Logging into octopusenergy.es and checking your account dashboard
• Looking at your Octopus Energy invoice
• Checking the Octopus Energy mobile app

energy_rates.title: Energy Rates
energy_rates.description:
Configure energy consumption rates.

⚠️ Important: Enter all rates as price without taxes. Taxes will be calculated automatically.

power_rates.title: Power Rates
power_rates.description: Configure power (potencia) rates. Power rates are always time-of-use with P1/P2 structure.

solar_features.title: Solar Features
solar_features.description: Configure solar panel features if applicable

other_concepts.title: Other concepts
other_concepts.description: Configure other concepts if applicable. This may include Bono Social, Equipment Rental, etc.

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: Configure taxes. Default values are standard Spanish electricity taxes.

pvpc_sensor.title: PVPC Price Sensor
pvpc_sensor.description:
Select the PVPC Hourly Pricing sensor to use for market price data.

Make sure you have the PVPC Hourly Pricing integration configured. The default sensor is 'sensor.pvpc'.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Octopus Energy API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please check your credentials and try again. Make sure you're using your Octopus Energy España account credentials.
error.email_password_required: Email and password are required to continue.
error.no_accounts_found: Authentication succeeded but no accounts were found. Please check that your account has access to at least one Octopus Energy España account. You may need to contact Octopus Energy support if this issue persists.
error.account_number_required: Please enter your account number to continue.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for more details and try again.

abort.already_configured: Octopus Energy España is already configured
